text: It was while I was at Tatsfield that I first visited Oberammergau in Bavaria to witness the Passion Play. The place and its people were to play an important part in my life. For five years in succession till war broke out in 1914, I spent my summer holidays there and became very intimate with the people and the environs. Every year between the Passion Plays, an interval of ten years, another play would be performed at the small theatre in the village, when new talent would be discovered and trained. ff wno whl S wa at tolfld Hhah f fras vinhd Oboranmergou inBawaria lo wima k Janion ly.f lac and d yol were hyiny.hyan broh u im 1914fsen my mmr kliday he cnd became very inlimat with k gol and lR cnvinon.Eey yar behwen k m inf m yah y woh jerformed al ll small Whealre in ll ilagn,wbn mew talul would b diocoverd and hained
